definitions.definition: An animal character with human-like characteristics; most commonly refers to such characters created by members of the furry subculture.
definitions.example: What percentage of furries are wolves?

definitions.definition: A member of the furry fandom.
definitions.example: The furry had designed an elaborate costume.

definitions.definition: Someone who roleplays or identifies with a furry character. (Compare therianthrope.)
Covered with fur, or with something resembling fur.
definitions.example: His treatment of our furry friends was nothing short of appalling.

definitions.definition: Of or related to the furry subculture.
